price: 38.Kaadu yeemene num iyyeh; (firqawni buxah marih num kinnuk) yi-maraw yoo kataya missa-le gita siinih ascasseeh tirri sin haam keh.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُونِ أَهۡدِكُمۡ سَبِيلَ ٱلرَّشَادِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
